sentences.sContent: It was moving fast like a squirrel, but it was as loud as a bear.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was moving fast like a squirrel, but it was as loud as a bear.
sentences.sCn: 它像松鼠一样快速的移动但那声音却像是熊发出的似的。

sentences.sContent: " The small squirrel said:" you do not believe, my hand tigers can do card, you see, say it proud raised the yellow soft tigers.
sentences.sContent_eng: " The small squirrel said:" you do not believe, my hand tigers can do card, you see, say it proud raised the yellow soft tigers.
sentences.sCn: 小松鼠说：“你们不信，我手里的老虎毛可以做证，你们看，说着它骄傲的举起了那根黄澄澄的松软的老虎毛。”

remMethod.val: 松鼠(squirrel)在广场(square)上跑来跑去

trans.tranOther: a small animal with a long furry tail that climbs trees and eats nuts
